translations.text: When the victory of Allah has come and the conquest,
Apabila telah datang pertolongan Allah dan kemenangan,

text_madani: وَرَأَيْتَ النَّاسَ يَدْخُلُونَ فِي دِينِ اللَّهِ أَفْوَاجًا

translations.text: And you see the people entering into the religion of Allah in multitudes,
dan engkau melihat manusia berbondong-bondong masuk agama Allah,

text_madani: فَسَبِّحْ بِحَمْدِ رَبِّكَ وَاسْتَغْفِرْهُ ۚ إِنَّهُ كَانَ تَوَّابًا

translations.text: Then exalt [Him] with praise of your Lord and ask forgiveness of Him. Indeed, He is ever Accepting of repentance.
maka bertasbihlah dengan memuji Tuhanmu dan mohonlah ampunan kepada-Nya. Sungguh, Dia Maha Penerima tobat.
